title: Trump Is Annoyed by the "President Bannon" Meme: A Closer Look | Mike Scollins & Ally Hord
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Steve Bannon's demotion and Jared Kushner's expanding role.
Then, Late Night writers Ally Hord and Mike Scollins participate in a podcast exclusive Late Night Chats.
LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
